abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says packaged salads from Dole facility in Ohio are linked to one death and 12 hospitalizations from listeria infection.

headline.print_headline: Dole Salads Packaged in Ohio Linked to Listeria Death
headline.main: Dole Salads Packaged in Ohio Linked to Listeria Death

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Packaged salads produced at a Dole facility in Ohio are linked to one death in Michigan, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.
lead_paragraph: Packaged salads produced at a Dole facility in Ohio are linked to one death in Michigan, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.
